believe me is a happy place here are
five reasons why the Philippines is my
favorite country the people Filipinos
are hospitable and genuinely the
friendliest people I've ever met nearly
everyone can speak fluent English which
takes away any language barriers and
they always greet people with a hello
sir and a huge smile natural beauty
pristine and untouched coastline
volcanoes never-ending greenery white
sandy beaches crystal-clear water palm
trees wildlife name anything tropical
and the Philippines housing
affordability the Philippines is one of
the cheapest countries in Asia which
allows you to have more fun for less try
$2 for this meal dollar 50 for a haircut
and 7 cents for a jeepney arrived
convenience you can find just about
anything you need from a street vendor
or a convenience store need to get
somewhere jump in a jeepney on a
motorbike in an uber or on the back of a
tricycle one island hop check out Cebu
Pacific for the cheapest domestic flight
fresh fruit and coconuts whichever
lovely island you're exploring you can
find fresh fruit and giant coconuts
which are so cheap and refreshing but
don't forget to try my favorite Filipino
dishes called sinigang 60 lechon holla
holla and bulalo
thank you for watching and i hope this
